p: As already mentioned, the P2X 1 receptor is a fast desensitizing receptor that opens an intrinsic ion channel that is non-selectively permeable for small cations when challenged with extracellular ATP. Figure 8.9 shows the current in response to 1 µM ATP for the first application of ATP (peak in Fig. 8.9a) and for consecutive ATP applications at 5-minute intervals and a holding potential of −60 mV.
